attributes.action: Against the stoppage of DLA, Carers Allowance and Attendance allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have heard this government wants to stop the care component of DLA, carers allowance and attendance allowance, leaving millions of people short of cash. This is unacceptable and cruel, if you are against this, please sign.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
